bug.title: Favorites not updated
bug.description: The list of favorites does not (always) show the current state of favorites. Issue reported by Serge Simard. ### How to reproduce (on a phone) 1. Add some favorites 2. Go into favorites 3. Select an event 4. In the event details screen: Remove the event from the favorites 5. Hit BACK button to return to favorites ### Expected behavior - The event should no longer be displayed in the favorites list. ### Actual behavior - The event is still being displayed in the favorites list.
